files.name: .husky/post-commit
files.addedContent:
#!/bin/sh
. "$(dirname "$0")/_/husky.sh"

# ShiftAI Post-commit Hook - Display AI analysis table
npx shiftai-cli hook post-commit

# Preserve exit code (don't block if analysis fails)
exit 0

files.name: .husky/pre-commit
files.addedContent:
npx lint-staged --allow-empty

# ShiftAI Pre-commit Hook - Detect and strip AI markers
npx shiftai-cli hook pre-commit

# Preserve exit code
exit $?

files.name: .husky/pre-push
files.addedContent:
#!/bin/sh
. "$(dirname "$0")/_/husky.sh"

# ShiftAI Pre-push Hook - Intercept push for AI analysis and PR management
# Git pre-push hook passes: $1=remote_name, $2=remote_url
export GIT_PUSH_REMOTE_NAME="$1"
export GIT_PUSH_REMOTE_URL="$2"
npx shiftai-cli hook pre-push

# Exit with the code from ShiftAI (it handles the actual push)
exit $?

files.name: fibonacci.js
